text: Baadarâne ( '), is an area in Chouf, Mont Liban, Lebanon.Baadarâne Around Guides Baadarane is away from Beirut at an elevation of 1,050 meters .Baadarane Geoview Baadarane is a town with an elevation of 1050m. It is known for the remains in al (Meydan) which is an old building. It is located on a mountain so the weather is cold and especially in winter, snow covers the town. ==References== Category:Populated places in Chouf District
title: Baadarâne
